title: Gingerbread biscuits
description: Howard made these gluten-free ginger biscuits to accompany his ginger cheesecakes, cutting out some of the dough into house-shaped biscuits. But the recipe is so good, you'll want to keep a box handy for nibbling.
ingredients: 230g/9oz buckwheat flour, plus extra for dusting
120g/4¼oz potato flour (also known as potato starch)
2 tbsp syrup from a jar of preserved stem ginger
2 tbsp date syrup or maple syrup
